topics.body:
Oh for fuck's sakes; a person did well with Ahri in a competition and people are already calling her "OP" and calling for her to be nerfed again.

When League of Legends players say she's most likely to be nerfed they're not kidding.  Why don't they nerf for the broken characters instead?



Also some more crossplay:
!http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2011/181/4/1/shannon_cosplay_portrait_by_conjurer_cj-d3kjwx0.jpg!
!http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2011/211/8/b/shannon_cosplay_teatime_by_conjurer_cj-d426yis.jpg!


Here's a fun fact:
One out of five guys crossdress once in a while.  I so can't wait until it is considered socially acceptable in general cause that's going to be awesome.

topics.body: Call me weird, but I wouldn't be nearly as bisexual as I am if it weren't for crossdressing.  Sure I like dudes as well, but I prefer women 4 out of 5 times.  If I had to summarize my preferences it would be mtf crossdressers > mtf intersex(umbrella term for shemales and such) > women > men.
